content: learn how to crochet this pretty little linked crochet bandana this crochet head kerchief is made using the linked crochet technique **the pattern is free with ads on my website ** > but you can also purchase the pdf here > or purchase the linked crochet ebook > which includes 30 patterns and 22 video tutorials > here 1 this pattern can also be > found in my crochet membership which > includes over 400 patterns and > 100s of video tutorials you can join > the membership here 2 1 https //nickinhc--nickishomemadecrafts thrivecart com/linked-crochet-made-easy/ ref=ravelry 2 https //www nickishomemadecrafts com/crochet/the-crochet-club/
